name: Sammael
description: Sammael is a medium celestial with a strong physique and a refined appearance that reflects its divine nature.
memorable: Sammael can shift between roles such as Destructor, Executioner, and Punisher, enhancing its versatility in combat.
goals: To serve its deity by inflicting punishment, destruction, or targeted execution based on its chosen role.
relations: Sammael may serve a higher celestial power or interact with other divine beings.
environment: Typically found in areas sacred to its deity or where divine will needs to be enforced.
strengths: Resilient to radiant damage and nonmagical physical attacks, with excellent Wisdom saving throws.
weaknesses: Average dexterity and intelligence scores limit its agility and cleverness.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack feature with options for slashing, fire, and radiant damage based on the chosen form.
most_powerful_ability: Angelic Weapons, adding 2d8 radiant damage on every successful weapon hit.
senses: Sammael has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive Perception of 17, boosting its ability to detect threats.
skills: Sammael is proficient in Insight and Perception, providing a +7 modifier for both skills to detect hidden dangers.
additional_information: Immunities to charmed, exhaustion, and frightened conditions.
Can communicate telepathically up to 120 feet.
Has the ability to impose lasting effects on defeated foes, reducing their Charisma.
Designed to be resilient against spells targeting Wisdom and Charisma.
Can shift roles strategically in combat for tactical advantage.
test_queries: powerful celestial warrior with divine abilities
angelic creature that inflicts lasting suffering
celestial being with radiant and fire attacks
Sammael's abilities as Destructor Executioner Punisher
creature resistant to radiant damage and conditions
